snippet.title: Coffee Talk Tokyo - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
A Coffee Talk spin-off by our partner @chorusworld@chorusworld , Coffee Talk Tokyo is the newest installment of the beloved coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator. It brings the warmth, heart, and delicious drinks from the previous games to an all-new café in Tokyo where humans and yokai alike share their stories.

Now brewing - ready to pour in 2025!

- - - - - - - - - -

Wishlist on Steam!
- https://store.steampowered.com/app/3161220/Coffee_Talk_Tokyo/

Follow us on Twitter
- https://twitter.com/coffeetalk_game

Join our community
- https://discord.gg/toge
